summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of the south 10 feet of Lot 18 and all of Lots 19 to 24 inclusive, Block 55, Boston Co.'s Plat and Lots 3, 4 and the north half of Lot 2, Block 24, Hanford's Addition to South Seattle, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-322 and 17-256, respectively.
